reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater pretty and appreciate its softness and warmth.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Five stars all around
items.body: Love this brand. So soft and warm. Color is tru, quality is amazing. Medium thickness and size is true. Too short for me, but I have multiple from this brand and are all quality Read more
items.author: Julie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very very soft
items.body: Beautiful sweater and really soft. Far from cheap looking,I could have down sized but I like over size, very warm Read more
items.author: Kris

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs Extremely Small and the Mohair is A LOT….
items.body: While I tend to love the Aelfric Eden brand, this sweater is not it, at least for me anyways. This sweater is not oversized, at all. I am a little bigger but when it comes to oversized, I can get an XL or a 2XL if I want to to be a true oversized fit. Aelfric doesn’t make anything in a 2XL but when I seen this oversized sweater, I was happy to get it but upon opening it, I was so wrong to be happy about it. This XL sweater is a Medium, maybe Large if I’m being generous so this runs extremely small. While I was expecting the mohair, it’s A LOT of mohair, so much mohair that it was extremely itchy and not very comfortable. The mohair is on the outside and the inside of the sweater. If that’s what you like, then you will love this sweater. The heaviness and quality of the fabric is well made, less the mohair and being small. Overall, I would not buy this again and I would not recommend this to anyone. If you are a fan of Aelfric Eden, you might like this but please know this is not oversized at all. The mohair is way too much as well. This just isn’t it for me and my preferences. Read more
items.author: MommyOfTwo2

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm and soft, but not oversized
items.body: I have become a huge fan of Aldrich Eden sweaters. This is my third, and I wish I had more. It’s super soft, very warm, and comfortable, and I’d live in it if I could! ,y only issue is that it’s not really oversized. I wear a medium usually, but got this in a large and it fits like a regular (not oversized) medium. Read more
items.author: Maria

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars As described
items.body: Such a beautiful sweater, so soft and heavy. As described Read more
items.author: Jackie Perez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty soft and makes a great gift
items.body: Makes a nice Christmas present Read more
items.author: Frances Sferlazza

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY 2 SIZES SMALLER THAN REGULAR SIZE
items.body: Very pretty sweater, if you get the sizing right. I don't like oversized. Warm and comfortable. The red heart had to go, so I removed it with a good seam ripper. Why not a matching pink one, if they had to put it on there. But I wouldn't recommend doing that unless you are experienced at seam ripping. Read more
items.author: Rain Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was a great buy!
items.body: Bought this to burry my mother in as she loves pink and wanted something soft for her. It's beyond perfect!! She would have loved it if she was alive and I know she would be happy with this choice! Read more
items.author: Pace's place

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White, Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
